name: Network Scientific Directory
overview:
Network Scientific Directory provides advertising and business development services to the scientific industry throughout the UK.

The Directory was set up to encourage growth and bring businesses together in the scientific industry. With Laboratories and Suppliers listed by category it makes finding a laboratory or supplier for your analysis requirements simple.

The organisation sources a comprehensive range of testing laboratories and laboratory suppliers for all your analysis requirements. Their service is easy to use by simply adding your request to their website. The service is free and perfect for anyone needing analytical testing and can be completely confidential if required.

The business delivers a variety of outsourcing and advertising solutions to businesses and laboratories, which are intended to speed up sourcing laboratory suppliers for analysis and other supplier requirements. With working knowedge of the scientific industry, the business also has fully qualified staff bringing clients together to mutually benefit their businesses.
